New Records: Kyle Higashioka became the first Padres catcher to homer in consecutive playoff games
Key Match Events: Kyle Higashioka's solo home run in the second inning started a five-run rally
Joe Musgrove left the game early due to right elbow tightness
The Padres' bullpen performed effectively to secure the victory
Pre-Game Insights: The Padres were known for their resilience and preparation
The game was a high-energy contest with significant moments
Post-Match Reflections: Padres players and manager expressed pride in the team's performance
The Braves had a chance but couldn't come back
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was a playoff contest with playoff implications
The Padres' win was significant as they aim to win a World Series title in memory of their late owner
The game was held at a sold-out Petco Park with the largest crowd in history
